phrases: Why do I feel like I was just having a really important dream?
Now it is going to bother me all day.
I thought he quit the track team to focus on his studies...
Has he picked up any bad habits, like staying out late?
I think there has to be some reason why his grades have fallen so much.
I was going to say that I spent the whole time playing in my room,
I did not think it would help.
I felt like I would said it before.
But when did I say that?
You have to start thinking about what you will do after high school.
Do you have any dreams or anything?
Like following in your father's footsteps?
His father has nothing to do with his future plans.
I think there is something wrong with me, with the way I am.
But most likely, I am only imagining it,
and I am actually just trying to escape because I do not feel like studying
the stuff they assign at school.
Is it okay for me to come unannounced?
I found him at the arcade.
You are good at piloting robots, Daichi-kun!
Hey, let us invite Daichi-kun, too.
If we do, I am sure Ai will come.
Having lots of people will be more fun!
Hey, we are going to a villa in Izu.
You guys want to come with us?
Will the old guy with the glasses complain?
He is not really your father, right?
I am amazed you know that.
This footage was taken by a local resident.
Are not you interested in this avatar's body?
You will come, will not you, Daichi-kun?
I will call you once the schedule's worked out.
Let us enjoy summer vacation together.
The wind in this town feels strange.
And the dream I had before I woke up this morning really bothers me.
But I just cannot remember it.
And now, an update on the strange light that appeared over Tanegashima.
Last night, at 11:20 PM, a strange light was seen shining above Tanegashima.
The weather bureau says it might have been either a moonbow,
a rainbow formed from lunar light,
or a meteorological phenomenon known as a circumhorizontal arc.
Are you really quitting the track team?
Were not you a candidate for the next captain?
So that is what you did not like.
Hey, have you ever had a dream you could not remember,
Dreams disappear the minute you wake up.
Once you are dead, everything's over.
It is been so long since we have gone to a festival together.
I am going to the shrine.
Do not you have to study for your make-up tests?
Actually, I did not promise anyone.
I just felt like I had to go.
Do not stay out too late.
Your teachers said to make sure you did not get into the habit of staying out late.
Have I eaten any watermelon this year?
I do not think you have had any yet this year.
These memories I have been recalling in flashes all day?
What kind of dream was it?
Do you have some time now?
I am a photographer for a men's fashion magazine.
Are you interested in being a model?
I am so lucky to have run into someone like you!
You will make a great model!
You will not know unless you try, right?
A future you do not choose does not exist.
The whole world becomes so much fun.
I have got somewhere to be today, and I am in a hurry.
Um, if you would like, you can use this.
That is a very kind thing to do for a girl you have never met.
I am on my way to a funeral.
For someone who was like family to me.
I was raised by someone who was not my parent.
But she was not really interested in me.
She was only interested in my inheritance.
She raised me to get her hands on it.
And when I realized that, I got mad and ran away.
But she died in an accident.
I still have not forgiven her.
But I use people to survive, as well.
In that sense, I am the same as she was.
Do not people live by helping one another?
My way of life cannot be masked by such beautiful words.
In the end, I am living in a way I hate.
And that makes my heart heavy.
Then why not start by changing the way you live?
If nothing else, that will make your heart lighter.
I do not think that is possible.
You see, I am the same as you.
The bus has been involved in a minor collision.
I apologize, but all passengers are asked to disembark here.
Maybe I was in too much of a rush.
After that, I am amazed you are fine!
You should go to a hospital, just in case.
I guess I will take a taxi or something.
If you are going the same way, want to share?
No, I do not think I am going the same way as you yet.
The shrine on Third Street, please.
There was a bus accident, was not there?
You found out about that fast...
Do you get that kind of news on the taxi radio?
I had a feeling there would be a bus accident in this area tonight.
No, is not that like a like psychic power?
You have heard of deja vu, have not you?
When you visit a place for the first time, but you feel you have been there before.
I have had a really strong sense of that all day.
And now, I even ended up predicting a bus accident.
Do you live in a country where they believe in things like that?
What do you mean by a country where they believe?
I think it would be interesting
if you could relive a day with perfect memories of what had happened.
If you knew what would happen, you could do whatever you wanted.
I think it would be boring to just repeat the same thing...
I think it is more exciting not knowing what will happen.
You do not feel frustrated, then?
Make sure you have not forgotten anything,
Why did I decide I had to come here?
I still feel like I have forgotten something important.
Please let the mission go well...
I love the view of space from this planet most of all.
But how do I get back, exactly?
How about a candy apple, sir?
I promised someone I would eat one with them,
Three shots for two hundred yen!
We are leaving for that villa tonight.
I have figured out the trick.
Once you are dead, everything's over!
The hopes my father left are still within me.
A future you do not choose does not exist.
That is why I am going to choose one, of my own free will.
Like the way you do not look at your right hand
and think, This is my right hand.
Your right hand is a part of you, so it is natural for it to be there.
It is not like it is me and the gun.
It is like both of us comprise me.
This shooting game does not matter!
Let us go to that villa and do something more fun.
I cannot go to the villa.
There is something I have to do, no matter what.
I do not think I am going the same way as you yet.
I am following the path I believe in.
carries our ship, Blume, away from Earth, to a world unexplored by man.
But we landed somewhere other than our goal.
And the Kiltgang appears there to destroy us.
The Earth Engine is in terrible danger!
